frequency.qtip: This axis value will represent frequency of unique value of other axis

max.qtip: This axis value will represent maximum of all the values mapped against unique values of other axis

mean.qtip: This axis value will represent mean (average) of all the values mapped against unique values of other axis

median.qtip: This axis value will represent median (that is, value separating the higher half of a values from the lower half) of the values mapped against unique values of other axis

min.qtip: This axis value will represent minimum of all the values mapped against unique values of other axis

mode.qtip: This axis value will represent mode (that is, value that appears most often) of the values mapped against unique values of other axis

range.qtip: This axis value will represent range (that is, the difference between maximum and minimum value) of the values mapped against unique values of other axis

sum.qtip: This axis value will represent sum of all the values mapped against unique values of other axis
